choose.when: select id, member_id, running_data_id, content, created_date, modifided_date, main_image_path, start_latitude, start_longitude, ST_Distance_Sphere( POINT(start_longitude, start_latitude), POINT(#{longitude}, #{latitude}) ) AS distance from board order by distance asc limit #{startIdx}, 5
select id, member_id, running_data_id, content, created_date, modifided_date, main_image_path, start_latitude, start_longitude from board order by created_date asc limit #{startIdx}, 5

mapper.select: select id, member_id, running_data_id, content, created_date, modifided_date, main_image_path, start_latitude, start_longitude from board where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into board ( member_id, running_data_id, content, main_image_path, start_longitude, start_latitude ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{runningDataId}, #{content}, #{mainImagePath}, #{startLongitude}, #{startLatitude} )
